name: Badge
description: A versatile badge component for status indicators, labels, and counts from shadcn/ui

variants.name: secondary
variants.use_case: Secondary information or less important status

props.name: variant
props.description: Visual style variant of the badge

features: Sufficient color contrast for all variants
recommendations: Consider role="status" for dynamic status badges
Ensure text is readable at small size
Don't rely on color alone for meaning
Use visually hidden text for counts (e.g., "3 unread messages")
